data.prayer: God, we ask you to raise up elders and deacons from the 40,413 believers in Aligarh, who will serve the church and equip it to do your work.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up until we all reach unity in the faith and in the knowledge of the Son of God and become mature, attaining to the whole measure of the fullness of Christ.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Aligarh, Uttar Pradesh, India
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Father, let the threatened of Aligarh, Uttar Pradesh, India know that it is better to trust in you than to trust in humans.
data.verse: It is better to take refuge in the Lord than to trust in humans.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 90 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Spirit, please defend the 40,413 believers in Aligarh against an unwillingness to suffer. Give them courage to face social rejection.
Father, help the 40,413 believers in Aligarh to know that you can make a big impact through their simple obedience today.
data.verse: you will be for me a kingdom of priests

data.prayer: Lord, please remember the Jat Rawat people. you said you wanted worshippers of every tongue and tribe and nation, yet we know of no worshippers among them.
Jesus, please send your Spirit to Aligarh, so they can have freedom.
data.verse: Now the Lord is the Spirit, and where the Spirit of the Lord is, there is freedom.

data.prayer: God, we pray both the men and women of Aligarh, Uttar Pradesh, India will find ways to meet in groups of two or three to encourage and correct one another from your Word.
Father, please send new teachers into the harvest, who can correct the lies of our enemy in the county of Aligarh, Uttar Pradesh, India.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.
